Protocol# PHBackgroundResourceUploadExtension

iOS 26.1+iPadOS 26.1+

```
protocol PHBackgroundResourceUploadExtension : AppExtension
```

## [ Mentioned in ](/documentation/Photos/PHBackgroundResourceUploadExtension#mentions)

[ Uploading asset resources in the background ](/documentation/photokit/uploading-asset-resources-in-the-background)## [Topics](/documentation/Photos/PHBackgroundResourceUploadExtension#topics)

### [Processing upload requests](/documentation/Photos/PHBackgroundResourceUploadExtension#Processing-upload-requests)

[`func process() -> PHBackgroundResourceUploadProcessingResult`](/documentation/photos/phbackgroundresourceuploadextension/process())Request to initiate processing background upload jobs.**Required**

[`enum PHBackgroundResourceUploadProcessingResult`](/documentation/photos/phbackgroundresourceuploadprocessingresult)### [Handling termination](/documentation/Photos/PHBackgroundResourceUploadExtension#Handling-termination)

[`func notifyTermination()`](/documentation/photos/phbackgroundresourceuploadextension/notifytermination())This notification will be called if the host is going to suspend/terminate the current execution. Extension clients should use this to stop the current execution. When the extension is activated, a new call will be presented by the host.**Required**
